channel.title: FY2023-24 on Annual Report Insights
channel.description: Recent content in FY2023-24 on Annual Report Insights

item.title: Eros International Media Limited: FY2023-24 Annual Report Analysis
item.description:
Executive Summary #

Eros International Media Limited experienced significant financial challenges in FY2023-24, characterized by:

  • 74.96% YoY revenue decline to ₹189.41 crore
  • Net loss after tax increased 247% to ₹416.03 crore
  • Negative shareholders’ equity of ₹(37,804) lakhs
  • Ongoing SEBI investigation raising regulatory concerns
  • Material uncertainty about going concern status

1. Financial Performance #

1.1 Key Financial Metrics (Standalone) #

  • Total Assets: ₹57,522 lakhs
  • Total Liabilities: ₹95,326 lakhs
  • Revenue: ₹19,142 lakhs
  • Net Loss: ₹(47,973) lakhs
  • EPS (Diluted): ₹(50.02)

1.2 Cash Flow Analysis #

  • Operating Cash Flow: ₹(439) lakhs
  • Investing Cash Flow: ₹3,326 lakhs
  • Financing Cash Flow: ₹(10,042) lakhs

1.3 Key Financial Ratios #

  • Current Ratio: 0.70
  • Debt-to-Assets Ratio: 0.66
  • Interest Coverage Ratio: -2.29

2. Business Operations #

2.1 Business Segments #

  1. Film Production, Acquisition, and Distribution
